thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com
thread.title: Olivier

author: Olivier
title: Olivier
text:
I have always loved ssense's strong brand identity, and unique product selection.
However, not only did Parcel Force's past delivery fees and performances fail to impress, but the systematic addition of taxes and duties payable post purchase simply made it difficult for ssense to compete in Europe.
I have recently noticed that the ssense team has adjusted its foreign currency policy, and also improved drastically on its delivery fees and time lines to the UK thanks to DHL.
As a result, I will surely purchase again and also recommend ssense to everyone. You can now enjoy the first class shopping experience!
